constantValues: Donor commitments represent the actual or prospective agreement between a donor and an organization for the donor to make a gift to the organization.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.name: commitmentDate

constantValues: This is the date that the donor made the commitment, not necessarily the date that the commitment was entered into the system.
